description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Catchwords; rubrication on leaves 1b-8b. Leaf 8 detached. Mild damp-staining. Origin: Likely early 18th century.
author: Khuwānsārī, Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad, 1607 or 1608-1686?
abstract: Commentary on Kitāb al-ṭahārah from al-Shahīd al-Awwal's Durūs al-sharʻīyah fī fiqh al-Imāmīyah; incomplete at end.
extent: 351 leaves : paper ; 256 x 195 (175 x 120) mm bound to 269 x 200 mm
title: [Mashāriq al-shumūs fī sharḥ al-Durūs].
provenance: Several smudged owner's stamps and a note on leaf 1a.
creator: خوانساري، حسين بن محمد، 1607 or 1608-1686?
subject: Shahīd al-Awwal, Muḥammad ibn Makkī, 1333 or 1334-1380—Durūs al-sharʻīyah fī fiqh al-Imāmīyah
binding_note: Quarter leather with green paper covers.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
